UnderSpire:Stick.NAME: Stick
UnderSpire:Stick.DESCRIPTION: * Its bark is worse than its bite.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION:
You threw the stick away.
Then picked it back up.

UnderSpire:Bandage.NAME: Bandage
UnderSpire:Bandage.DESCRIPTION: * It has already been used many times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You re-applied the bandage. Still kind of gooey.

UnderSpire:ToyKnife.NAME: Toy Knife
UnderSpire:ToyKnife.DESCRIPTION:
* !D! AT
* Made of plastic. Appears to have seen some use.

UnderSpire:BalletShoes.NAME: Ballet Shoes
UnderSpire:BalletShoes.DESCRIPTION:
* !D! AT
* These used shoes make you feel incredibly dangerous.

UnderSpire:FadedRibbon.NAME: Faded Ribbon
UnderSpire:FadedRibbon.DESCRIPTION:
* !B! DF
* If you're cuter, monsters won't hit you as hard.

UnderSpire:ManlyBandanna.NAME: Manly Bandanna
UnderSpire:ManlyBandanna.DESCRIPTION:
* !B! DF
* It has seen some wear. It has abs drawn on it.

UnderSpire:OldTutu.NAME: Old Tutu
UnderSpire:OldTutu.DESCRIPTION:
* !B! DF
* Finally, a protective piece of armor.

UnderSpire:Locket.NAME: Heart Locket
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION:
!B! DF
You can feel it beating.

UnderSpire:MonsterCandy.NAME: Monster Candy
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You ate the Monster Candy. Very un-licorice-like.

UnderSpire:Garbage1.NAME: Garbage
UnderSpire:Garbage1.DESCRIPTION: * It probably tastes as good as it looks.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It tastes like garbage. What did you expect?

UnderSpire:Garbage2.NAME: Trash
UnderSpire:Garbage2.DESCRIPTION: * You know some people who would probably collect this.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Is this even edible? Might as well try.

UnderSpire:Garbage3.NAME: Rock Candy
UnderSpire:Garbage3.DESCRIPTION: * Here is a recipe to make this at home: NL 1. Find a rock
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You taste your teeth breaking. It's surprisingly sweet.

UnderSpire:TemmieFlake.NAME: Temmie Flakes
UnderSpire:TemmieFlake.DESCRIPTION: * It's just torn up pieces of construction paper.

UnderSpire:PumpkinRings.NAME: Pumpkin Rings
UnderSpire:PumpkinRings.DESCRIPTION: * A small pumpkin cooked like onion rings.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You ring the pumpkin. Nobody seems to be home.

UnderSpire:DarkCandy.NAME: Dark Candy
UnderSpire:DarkCandy.DESCRIPTION:
* Seems even more out of place than everything else.
* Tastes like marshmallows.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It tastes like your teeth are rotting. You feel hyper.

UnderSpire:HushPuppy.NAME: Hush Puppy
UnderSpire:HushPuppy.DESCRIPTION: * This wonderful spell will stop a dog from casting magic.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Don't feed the dogs at night.

UnderSpire:LegendaryHero.NAME: Legendary Hero
UnderSpire:LegendaryHero.DESCRIPTION: * Sandwich shaped like a sword. Increases ATTACK for the combat when eaten.
